roleset.name: send electronically
roleset.note: WIRE-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls send-11.1-1, instr_communication-37.4. (from wire.01-v)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Jackson had ordered his then business adviser , Myung - Ho Lee , a U.S. - educated Korean lawyer based in Seoul , to wire $ 150,000 to a bank in Mali for a voodoo chief named Baba , who then had 42 cows ritually sacrificed for the ceremony .
example.arg: his then business adviser , Myung - Ho Lee , a U.S. - educated Korean lawyer based in Seoul
for a voodoo chief named Baba , who then had 42 cows ritually sacrificed for the ceremony

roleset.name: attach with wires
roleset.note: WIRE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls tape-22.4. (from wire.02-v)

example.name: specific meaning
example.text: [Video Telecom Corp., which markets videoconferencing systems,]-2 is working with court reporters [*-2]to wire a nationwide network to allow depositions by live television.
example.arg: a nationwide network to allow depositions by live television

example.name: arg2
example.text: Called Task Broker, the program acts something like an auctioneer among a group of [computers]-1 wired [*]-1 together.
